[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@candidstartup/react-virtual-scroll](./react-virtual-scroll.md) &gt; [VirtualBaseProps](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.md) &gt; [minNumPages](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.minnumpages.md)

## VirtualBaseProps.minNumPages property

The minimum number of virtual pages to use when inner container would otherwise be more than [VirtualBaseProps.maxCssSize](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.maxcsssize.md) big. You should never normally need to change this.

**Signature:**

```typescript
minNumPages?: number;
```
